data.name: ShareEditRestrictions
data.value: According to the cooperative bylaws, share modifications are restricted. Certificate numbers, quantities, and values cannot be changed. Use the transfer function to change ownership.

data.name: MemberCannotBeChangedUseTransfer
data.value: Member cannot be changed directly - use transfer function

data.name: QuantityCannotBeChanged
data.value: Quantity cannot be changed after issuance

data.name: NominalValueFixedBySatzung
data.value: Nominal value is fixed by bylaws

data.name: SuspendedShareWarning
data.value: Suspended shares do not count towards cooperative capital

data.name: TwoYearNoticePeriod
data.value: According to §5, a two-year notice period is required

data.name: ShareNotFullyPaidWarning
data.value: This share has outstanding payments. According to bylaws, shares must be fully paid before certain actions.

data.name: ShareCannotBeEdited
data.value: This share cannot be edited due to its current status

data.name: ConfirmShareCancellation
data.value: Are you sure you want to cancel this share? According to §5 of the bylaws, a two-year notice period applies and this action cannot be reversed.

data.name: CancellationDateMustBeTwoYears
data.value: According to §5 of the bylaws, the cancellation date must be at least two years from now

data.name: ShareMustBeFullyPaidBeforeCancellation
data.value: According to the bylaws, shares must be fully paid before they can be cancelled

data.name: UncheckIfPaymentIsPending
data.value: Uncheck if payment is pending verification

data.name: PaymentAmountExceedsOutstanding
data.value: Payment amount cannot exceed outstanding amount

data.name: ShareAlreadyFullyPaid
data.value: This share is already fully paid

data.name: ConfirmMarkAsPaid
data.value: Mark share {0} as fully paid? This will record a payment of {1}.

data.name: CancelShareConfirmation
data.value: Are you sure you want to cancel this share?

data.name: OffboardConfirmation
data.value: Are you sure you want to offboard this member? They will be removed at the end of the fiscal year after all shares are returned and dividends paid.

data.name: TransferProcessInfo
data.value: Share transfers require board approval and cannot be reversed once completed.

data.name: NoActionsAvailable
data.value: No actions available for this transfer.

data.name: NoPermissionToApprove
data.value: You do not have permission to approve share transfers

data.name: NoPermissionToReject
data.value: You do not have permission to reject share transfers

data.name: ApproveTransferConfirmation
data.value: Are you sure you want to approve this share transfer?

data.name: CompleteTransferConfirmation
data.value: Are you sure you want to complete this transfer? This action cannot be undone.

data.name: CancelTransferConfirmation
data.value: Are you sure you want to cancel this transfer?

data.name: AuditLogDescription
data.value: Complete audit trail of all system operations and changes

data.name: NoAuditLogsFound
data.value: No audit logs found matching the current filters

data.name: ConsolidationExplanation
data.value: Share consolidation combines multiple certificates into a single certificate while preserving all payment and dividend history. This makes it easier to manage your shares.

data.name: NoConsolidatableShares
data.value: This member has no shares that can be consolidated. At least 2 active, fully paid shares are required.

data.name: ConsolidationPartiallyPaidWarning
data.value: Some shares are not fully paid. Outstanding amounts will be combined in the new certificate.

data.name: ConfirmConsolidationMessage
data.value: Are you sure you want to consolidate {0} share certificates? This action cannot be undone.

data.name: ConsolidationSuccessMessage
data.value: Successfully consolidated {0} share certificates into certificate {1}.

data.name: MessageRetried
data.value: Message has been queued for retry

data.name: CancelMessageConfirmation
data.value: Are you sure you want to cancel this message?

data.name: SendPaymentRemindersConfirmation
data.value: Send payment reminders to {0} members with unpaid shares?

data.name: NotesPlaceholder
data.value: Optional notes about this share issue

data.name: SatzungRule1
data.value: Shares must be fully paid within 30 days

data.name: SatzungRule2
data.value: Each share has a nominal value of €250

data.name: SatzungRule4
data.value: Shares can be cancelled with 2-year notice

data.name: ShareCreatedSuccessfully
data.value: Share created successfully with certificate number {0}

data.name: IssueDateCannotBeFuture
data.value: Issue date cannot be in the future

data.name: IssueDateTooOld
data.value: Issue date cannot be more than 1 year in the past

data.name: TotalSharesExceedLimit
data.value: Member already has {0} shares. Maximum allowed: {1} additional shares

data.name: ErrorProcessingRequest
data.value: An error occurred while processing your request.

data.name: DevelopmentModeExplanation
data.value: Swapping to Development environment will display more detailed information about the error that occurred.

data.name: DevelopmentModeWarning
data.value: The Development environment shouldn't be enabled for deployed applications.

data.name: DevelopmentModeInstructions
data.value: It can result in displaying sensitive information from exceptions to end users. For local debugging, enable the Development environment by setting the ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT environment variable to Development and restarting the app.

data.name: NoPermissionToAccess
data.value: You don't have permission to access this resource.

data.name: ShareListDescription
data.value: Manage cooperative shares and certificates. View share details, track payments, and handle transfers.

data.name: ShareInformationHelp
data.value: Each share represents €250 of capital in the cooperative. Shares can be Active, Cancelled, Transferred, or Suspended.

data.name: ShareStatusHelp
data.value: Share status indicates current state: Active shares have voting rights, Cancelled shares are returned, Transferred shares changed ownership, Suspended shares are temporarily inactive.

data.name: PaymentStatusHelp
data.value: Shows payment progress: Fully Paid (green), Partially Paid (yellow), or Unpaid (red). Members must pay full amount for voting rights.

data.name: ShareActionsHelp
data.value: Available actions: View details, Edit share, Record payment, Cancel share, or Transfer to another member.

data.name: ShareTransfersHelp
data.value: Transfer shares between members. Requires board approval and affects voting rights. Both members must be active.

data.name: CreateShareDescription
data.value: Issue new shares to members. Each share has a nominal value of €250 and must be paid in full.

data.name: MemberSelectionHelp
data.value: Select the member who will own these shares. Only active members can receive new shares.

data.name: ShareQuantityHelp
data.value: Number of shares to issue. Minimum 1 share, maximum 1000 shares per member total.

data.name: ShareValueHelp
data.value: Share value is fixed at €250 per share as defined in the Satzung. Total value = Quantity × €250.

data.name: CertificateNumberHelp
data.value: Unique certificate number automatically generated. Format: CERT-YYYY-NNNN (e.g., CERT-2024-0001).

data.name: SatzungRulesHelp
data.value: All shares must comply with cooperative bylaws: €250 nominal value, maximum 1000 shares per member, 2-year cancellation notice required.

data.name: DividendListDescription
data.value: Calculate, approve, and distribute dividends to members based on their share holdings and cooperative surplus.

data.name: DividendCalculationHelp
data.value: Dividends are calculated based on share holdings and cooperative surplus. Use the Calculate Dividends button to compute amounts for all members.

data.name: DividendStatusHelp
data.value: Dividend status: Declared (calculated), Approved (board approved), Paid (distributed), Cancelled (rejected).

data.name: DividendApprovalHelp
data.value: Dividends must be approved by the board before payment. Only approved dividends can be marked as paid.

data.name: TaxWithheldHelp
data.value: Tax withholding may apply to dividend payments. Net amount is shown after deducting any applicable taxes.

data.name: DividendFiltersHelp
data.value: Filter dividends by fiscal year and status. Use filters to view specific periods or track payment progress.

data.name: MessagesDescription
data.value: Send notifications to members via email, SMS, or WhatsApp. Track message delivery and manage payment reminders.

data.name: MessageTypesHelp
data.value: Different message types: Payment Reminders, Dividend Notifications, General Assembly Notices, Welcome Messages, and General Broadcasts.

data.name: MessageChannelsHelp
data.value: Send messages via Email (default), SMS (text messages), or WhatsApp (requires integration setup).

data.name: MessageStatusHelp
data.value: Message status: Pending (queued), Sending (in progress), Sent (delivered to provider), Delivered (confirmed receipt), Failed (delivery error).

data.name: PaymentRemindersHelp
data.value: Automatically send payment reminders to members with outstanding share payments. Reminders are sent to all members with unpaid shares.

data.name: MessageActionsHelp
data.value: Available actions: View message details, Retry failed messages, Cancel pending messages. Failed messages can be retried or cancelled.

data.name: AuditLogPurposeHelp
data.value: The audit log tracks all changes to the system for compliance and security. Every modification is recorded with user, timestamp, and details.

data.name: AuditLogFiltersHelp
data.value: Filter audit entries by user, entity type, date range, and action type. Use filters to investigate specific changes or time periods.

data.name: AuditLogPermissionsHelp
data.value: Only Vorstand (board) and Aufsichtsrat (supervisory board) members can view audit logs. The log is read-only and cannot be modified.

data.name: AuditLogEntriesHelp
data.value: Each entry shows: User who made the change, Action performed, Entity affected, Timestamp, and Permission used.

data.name: ViewChangesHelp
data.value: Click 'View Changes' to see detailed information about what was modified in each audit entry.

data.name: TagsHelp
data.value: Tags help organize and search documents

data.name: IsConfidentialHelp
data.value: Confidential documents require special permissions to access

data.name: ConfirmDeleteDocument
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete the document '{0}'?
